summary: As a Sr Sales Operations Analyst, I'm driven to providing actionable insights to various business stakeholders by synthesizing business knowledge and analytical methods to drive revenue. I generate KPI reports that provide visibility into the business. I also act as a Sales mentor to the Renewals team. I provide instruction to team members on Reporting and Analytics in order to ensure that all reports are understood and beneficial. I am passionate about leadership, teamwork and team building. I love to let my teammates shine and provide support wherever possible. I believe you need a strong team to be successful!Outside of work, I enjoy spending time with my family, traveling, discovering new music, and off-roading. I am a lover of science and technology, especially theoretical physics. Sales Operations | Sales Enablement | Management | Reporting | Leadership | Teamwork | Analytics
